workshoptitle: MySQL HeatWave Hands-On-Lab:  Build MySQL HeatWave OLTP, OLAP, AUTOML with Lakehouse -HOL

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies. The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Compartment, VCN and MySQL HeatWave DB System and DB Data
Lab 2: Create Compute with MySQL Shell
Lab 3: Add HeatWave Cluster to the DB sytem
Lab 4: Load data into HeatWave Cluster
Lab 5: Develop MySQL HeatWave App with LAMP
Lab 6: (Bonus) Upload data to Object Storage for HeatWave Lakehouse - black-friday
Lab 7: (Bonus) Load CSV data from OCI Object Store to Lakehouse - black-friday
Lab 8: (Bonus) Create and Use HeatWave AutoML Model - black_friday
Lab 9: (Bonus) Create Oracle Analytics Cloud Instance
Lab 10: (Bonus) Build a real-time dashboard in Oracle Analytics Cloud with MySQL HeatWave  - black_friday
Lab 12: (Bonus)  Develop MySQL HeatWave Apps with Oracle APEX
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
